The updated Chalhoub University Learning Directory brings you the latest learning experiences from across our 5 Academies all in one place. Whether you're planning your next career step, seeking inspiration, or simply curious about whatâ€™s new, the directory is your guide to continuous growth.

LEARNING PATHWAYS Top Learners Q2 2025

A huge Congratulations to our top learners for Quater 2 2025! Your commitment to continuous learning and development has been outstanding, leveraging the value of the Learning Pathways and setting a benchmark for growth. 
 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/c7072ad5-cdeb-641d-fd54-bae6f93d5336.png>

- KSA: Shaha Borajy (Marketing)
- Kuwait: Nesreen Haider (People & Culture)
